Articles.Content:
Scotty, we need to go faster!

(Are we there yet?)

21:58 <@SteamDB> Ã‚Â» Changelist 1014635 (0 apps and 1 packages) - [https://steamdb.info/changelist/1014635/](https://steamdb.info/changelist/1014635/)

21:58 <@SteamDB> Package: 65995 - Blender (Steam Sub 65995)
3500 posts, come on hype train
\*Mashing F5\*
***hype***e
to the hype train and beyond

> 
> What will be of the Hype Train once 1.0 is release? Will it forever break free of Kerbol's gravity and return for 1.1?

Im not a Hype Train specialist, but i guess it will go to deep space hybernation and will wake up if it is needed again!
![AGl8Mfw.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/AGl8Mfw.jpg)

> 
> 21:58 <@SteamDB> Ã‚Â» Changelist 1014635 (0 apps and 1 packages) - [https://steamdb.info/changelist/1014635/](https://steamdb.info/changelist/1014635/)
> 21:58 <@SteamDB> Package: 65995 - Blender (Steam Sub 65995)

I don't even know what that means and i'm still hyped!

> 
> Scotty, we need to go faster!
> (Are we there yet?)

OOoch, Cap'n! We're going as fast as we can! I dinnae know if she can take any more of this!

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BHBevPYVzaY](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BHBevPYVzaY)

hype-BOOM
For about 2 minutes here i was spamming refresh here and I was getting 3 pages every press. We've slowed way down. Its 10am
Getting near a 100 page increase in Hypetrain page record. Omwards!
OH NOOOO. The Mexican siesta has started!
Kasper is now viewing Page too... Cthulhu why have you forsaken me
10 o'clock squad time.
Is the Server Migration train slower than the Hype train?
6 minutes on kerbalx!

There is new "Project Odyssey" from Bob Fitch to watch while waiting

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/0VhsHd9gqDU?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
It's a wonderful hype.

Playing darude-sandstorm and the 1812 overture. At the same time.

FOR HYPE.
Ive even got church bells tolling the hour.

> 
> Is the Server Migration train slower than the Hype train?

Nothing beats the speed of Hype Train...

> 
> What will be of the Hype Train once 1.0 is release? Will it forever break free of Kerbol's gravity and return for 1.1?

More anticlimactic. I just create a wormhole and drive the Hype Train to the sheds for a rest. She'll need it, as she'd going billions of orders of magnitude faster than ever before!
